explanation:
code_hardening: Added null checks for context and key, initialized the return variable to the provided default, and marked reflective locals as final where applicable.
resolve_compilation_errors: none.
exception_handling: Preserved explicit rethrow of IllegalArgumentException; in the generic Exception catch, ensured the return value remains the provided default instead of an empty string.
logic_customization: Updated the signature to accept a default-value parameter, initialized the return value to def, invoked the two-argument android.os.SystemProperties.get(String, String) via reflection, passed both key and def, and ensured missing keys or failures return def.
refactoring: Changed visibility to private, kept naming consistent while reflecting default-value semantics, and aligned with the existing caller that supplies a default value.
misc: Updated the Javadoc/comment to document default-return behavior and note the reflective source/overload usage; no new custom API calls beyond the two-argument SystemProperties.get overload.
